title: Rarity System
description: Rarity levels for equipment, spells, feats, and other game elements

accessRequirements.description: How characters gain access to this rarity

rarities.name: Common
rarities.description: Widely available options that most characters can access. If no rarity appears in the traits of an item, spell, or other game element, it's of common rarity.

rarities.name: Uncommon
rarities.description: Available only to those who have special training, grew up in a certain culture, or come from a particular part of the world.
rarities.accessRequirements: Requires special training, cultural background, or Access entry criteria

rarities.name: Rare
rarities.description: Almost impossible to find and are usually given out only by the GM.

rarities.name: Unique
rarities.description: Literally one-of-a-kind in the game world.
rarities.accessRequirements: GM approval required, only one exists

notes: The GM might alter the way rarity works or change the rarity of individual items to suit the story they want to tell
Access entries explain criteria for characters to choose uncommon options as common options
Rarity primarily applies to equipment and magic items, but spells, feats, and other rules elements also have rarity
